metadata.title: USN-7267-1 -- libsndfile vulnerability
metadata.description: It was discovered that libsndfile incorrectly handled certain malformed OggVorbis files. An attacker could possibly use this issue to cause libsndfile to crash, resulting in a denial of service.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-7267-1` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  libsndfile1 - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm4 libsndfile1-dev - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm4 sndfile-programs - 1.0.25-10ubuntu0.16.04.3+esm4 Available with Ubuntu Pro (Infra-only): https://ubuntu.com/pro
